The existence of this banjar hot spring has been known since time immemorial, even when there was colonization by the Japanese army in Bali, this banjar hot spring has been used as a bathing place. Location Banjar Hot Water Spring

Banjar Hot Water Spring is located in Banjar Countryside, Banjar sub district and Singaraja Regency. It is about 1,5 Km from Banjar or 24 Km from Singaraja Town. To reach the Hot Water location in Banjar, we can use the motor vehicle through the main road with good condition and passing the Balinese Village with unique culture life. The nearest accommodations like hotels or lodging including restaurants are also available in particular at Lovina Beach area. There are many public transportation also available to connect the travel to Singaraja town. If you plan to come here, it would be nice if someone took you, because the location is very far from downtown areas such as Seminyak and Kuta, which is estimated to take about 3 hours driving a car to reach the location of this hot spring banjar. History Banjar Hot Water Spring

Banjar Hot Water Spring source is predictably built since of hundreds of year ago and since the Japanese colonize the Indonesia, this place has developed into three pools to relocate the water for taking a bath. The Japanese had also developed its military officer resort close to this area. Having bathing in the heat water containing the brimstone, it will be able to heal the skin disease. This public bath which is built by Japanese now is exploited by public society. Beside of that, now this place is opened for tourist who can use this bathing place to swim in hot pool and also enjoy the water fall. Enjoying the hot water fall, we can feel like squeezing, especially at pool equipped by the douche with the high about 3,5 meters, so that can make the body refresh and relaxation.

Pool at Banjar Hot Water Spring

Banjar hot spring pool is very often visited by foreign and domestic tourists, most of them come here to soak and enjoy the warm water that comes out of the fountain from the dragon's mouth statue. According to local residents Banjar hot water contains sulfur which is believed to be very effective for curing skin diseases. In this banjar pool there are 3 pools that you can use, and these three pools are different in terms of area, depth and shower, as for the three pools are as follows

  1. The first pool or the top one has 6 dragon mouth showers. This first pool has a width of 1.5 meters with a length of about 12 meters and a depth of 1 meter.
  2. The second pool is the largest pool with a width of about 10 meters and a length of 12 meters with a terraced pool depth. the closest to the shower is 1 meter deep and the farthest is 2 meters deep. In this second pool there are 5 dragon showers. This second pool is the pool most used by visitors. Please be careful as the depth of the hot tub varies. The one closest to the shower is 1 meter deep and the one that keeps dropping to 2 meters. Because the second pool is the widest and has varying depths, it makes the second pool a favorite hot water pool for visitors to swim or soak.
  3. The third pool or the last pool has 3 dragon showers with a height of 3.5 meters. In this third pool, many visitors use to enjoy the massage of the water that falls from the dragon shower. In this pool, it is as if visitors will be massaged by the water that comes out of the dragon's mouth.

Facilities at Banjar Hot Water Spring

As for the facilities at Banjar Hot Water Spring, they are very complete, where from the parking lot you walk to the Hot Springs you will see left and right there are shops selling souvenirs here, and here there is also a restaurant for those of you who want to enjoy lunch after bathing at spring pool or just for drinking, and also in this hot spring banjar there is a storage area for those of you who want to store your important things when you swim, and there are lots of changing rooms, so you don't have to scramble to change clothes and there is also a toilet and a shower if after bathing you want to wash your body with fresh water, and there are also spas and massages here if you want to relieve fatigue while being massaged by the therapists who are here. So if you come here, you don't need to hesitate anymore, all the facilities are available here, even towels are also available here. Enjoy bathing in water containing sulfur which is believed to be very good for your skin health.

Best Time for Visit Banjar Hot Water Spring

The best time to visit Banjar Hot Springs is in the morning or evening, where in the morning the sun will not be too hot, so when you take a bath you will not be overheated by the sun, as well as in the afternoon where the sun will set in the west. , so you will not be exposed to the sun in this pool and you will feel very comfortable to enjoy the warm water that comes out of this hot spring. But because the time is right and it's not hot in the morning and evening, most tourists visit at that time which causes it to be very crowded, and you can queue to get your turn in the shower water in this pool. If you are on vacation in Bali, it would be nice to travel to the northern area of ​​​​the island of Bali to visit this famous Banjar hot spring
